dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: So, hey B, did you see this, uh, news about SCAT Airlines?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: So, hey B, did you see this, uh, news about S C A T Airlines?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Oh, yeah! The Kazakh one, right? What a mess. Bird strikes, of all things.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh, yeah! The Kazakh one, right? What a mess. Bird strikes, of all things.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Kazakh airline SCAT has addressed passengers and announced temporary changes to the schedule of several flights. The reason is force majeure circumstances, specifically damage to the airline™s aircraft caused by bird strikes.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: I know, right? Like, actual *bird strikes* damaging aircraft. That's some serious force majeure.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: I know, right? Like, actual bird strikes damaging aircraft. That's some serious force majeure.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The reason is force majeure circumstances, specifically damage to the airline™s aircraft caused by bird strikes.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Totally. And it's causing, you know, a bunch of temporary schedule changes.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Totally. And it's causing, you know, a bunch of temporary schedule changes.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Kazakh airline SCAT has addressed passengers and announced temporary changes to the schedule of several flights.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Right. So, what's happening with the passengers? Are they just, like, stranded?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Right. So, what's happening with the passengers? Are they just, like, stranded?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Well, for the Antalya-Astana route, passengers are actually being put up in hotels. They're waiting for a backup plane.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Well, for the Antalya-Astana route, passengers are actually being put up in hotels. They're waiting for a backup plane.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The following changes were made to the Antalya " Astana and Aktobe " Antalya routes: In Antalya, while waiting for the arrival of a backup aircraft, hotel accommodations have been extended for passengers.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: [interrupts] Oh, that's good at least.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh, that's good at least.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, for a flight scheduled way out for June 23rd, 2025. Which is, like, a year from now.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, for a flight scheduled way out for June twenty third, twenty twenty five. Which is, like, a year from now.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The flight is scheduled for June 23, 2025.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Wait, 2025? That seems... really far in the future for a "temporary change."
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Wait, twenty twenty five? That seems... really far in the future for a temporary change.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: I know, right? Uh, I guess maybe it's the *new* scheduled date for those specific flights. And in Aktobe, they're getting hot meals and drinks, so that's something.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: I know, right? Uh, I guess maybe it's the new scheduled date for those specific flights. And in Aktobe, they're getting hot meals and drinks, so that's something.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: In Aktobe, passengers awaiting departure have been provided with hot meals and drinks.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Okay, so some comfort there. But I saw it also mentioned other delays, like due to aircraft redistribution?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Okay, so some comfort there. But I saw it also mentioned other delays, like due to aircraft redistribution?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, exactly. Because they're shuffling planes around to cover the damaged ones, uh, other routes are getting hit.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, exactly. Because they're shuffling planes around to cover the damaged ones, uh, other routes are getting hit.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Due to the redistribution of aircraft, flight delays may occur on June 23, 2025, on the following routes:

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Like which ones?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Like which ones?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Almaty to Sharm El Sheikh, Almaty to Antalya, and the return Antalya to Almaty – those could all see delays on June 23rd as well.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Almaty to Sharm El Sheikh, Almaty to Antalya, and the return Antalya to Almaty - those could all see delays on June twenty third as well.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Due to the redistribution of aircraft, flight delays may occur on June 23, 2025, on the following routes: Almaty " Sharm El Sheikh, Almaty " Antalya, and Antalya " Almaty.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Ugh, that's just a cascade effect, isn't it? And wasn't there also a full cancellation mentioned?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Ugh, that's just a cascade effect, isn't it? And wasn't there also a full cancellation mentioned?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Oh, yeah. The Astana-Doha flight on June 23rd? That's completely off.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh, yeah. The Astana-Doha flight on June twenty third? That's completely off.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The airline also announced that, due to the international situation and temporary restrictions on flights in certain air zones, the Astana " Doha flight scheduled for June 23 has been canceled.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: [overlaps] Oh, wow.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh, wow.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Due to, uh, "international situation and temporary restrictions in certain air zones." So, you know, not even bird-related for that one.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Due to, uh, international situation and temporary restrictions in certain air zones. So, you know, not even bird-related for that one.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The airline also announced that, due to the international situation and temporary restrictions on flights in certain air zones, the Astana " Doha flight scheduled for June 23 has been canceled.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Man, what a headache for those travelers. Uh, bird strikes, international politics... Just a rough time to fly, it sounds like.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Man, what a headache for those travelers. Uh, bird strikes, international politics... Just a rough time to fly, it sounds like.

dialogue_turns.text: Absolutely. Hopefully, they get everyone sorted out smoothly.
